name: 鍾朝安
objective:
本課程主要內容將會介紹: 
1 何謂半導體。  2 半導體的特性。  3 半導體的取得來源與方法介紹。 4 半導體材料的不同應用。 5 半導體的相關產業鏈介紹。 6 與半導體相關產業的工作介紹。
The main contents of this course will introduce: 
1 What is named semiconductor. 
2. Characteristics of semiconductors. 
3. Introduction of methods to access semiconductors materials. 
4. Different applications of semiconductor materials. 
5. Introduction to the semiconductor industry and its supply chain. 
6. Introduction to work content in semiconductor industry.
